title: Workshop on Environmental Analysis and Documentation Tools for Online Education Program Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online learning platform usage
context.additional_context: Practitioner competency development course for planning and operating educational programs in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose the current state of education using environmental analysis tools (e.g., 5 Forces, SWOT) for designing online educational programs.
Learners can systematically organize analysis results and establish an educational roadmap using documentation tools.
Learners can draft customized online educational content based on diverse learner needs analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
